channel.title: CVE Feed for florent73 -- WP Maintenance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for florent73 -- WP Maintenance

item.title: CVE-2024-1472|2024-02-20T18:56:33.389Z -- florent73 -- WP Maintenance
item.description: The WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 6.1.6 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bypass the plugin's maintenance mode obtain post and page content via REST API.
